message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "This study analyzes the impact of public-private partnerships in the transport sector in Brazil using data from the National Confederation of Transport.", "dataset": ["National Confederation of Transport"], "topic": ["Public-Private Partnerships", "Transport"]}, {"sentence": "The goal of this research is to explore the relationship between economic growth and renewable energy consumption. We used data from the International Energy Agency (IEA) and World Development Indicators (WDI) for 20 countries over a 10-year period.", "dataset": ["International Energy Agency (IEA)", "World Development Indicators (WDI)"], "topic": ["Energy", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "We analyzed the impact of climate change on health outcomes by combining data from the Global Burden of Disease (GBD) project with temperature and precipitation data from the Climate Research Unit (CRU).", "dataset": ["Global Burden of Disease (GBD)", "Climate Research Unit (CRU)"], "topic": ["Climate Change", "Health"]}, {"sentence": "In this paper, we used a unique dataset from the Food Price Data System to analyze the impact of trade policies on food prices in developing countries.", "dataset": ["Food Price Data System"], "topic": ["Trade", "Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "We investigated the relationship between social protection programs and nutrition outcomes in India using data from the National Family Health Survey (NFHS) and the India Human Development Survey (IHDS).", "dataset": ["National Family Health Survey (NFHS)", "India Human Development Survey (IHDS)"], "topic": ["Social Protection", "Nutrition"]}, {"sentence": "Using a household survey and administrative tax records, we estimated the impact of the recent tax reform on inequality in Colombia.", "dataset": ["household survey", "administrative tax records"], "topic": ["Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]}, {"sentence": "We used data from the World Bank's Enterprise Surveys to analyze the relationship between gender and firm performance in several African countries.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Enterprise Surveys"], "topic": ["Gender", "Competitiveness", "Fragility, Conflict, and Violence"]}, {"sentence": "This paper examines the impact of extractive industries on economic development using a novel dataset that combines information on resource extraction with data on investment and trade.", "dataset": ["novel dataset that combines information on resource extraction with data on investment and trade"], "topic": ["Extractive Industries", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "To investigate how regional integration impacts economic growth, we combined data from the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development and the World Development Indicators.", "dataset": ["United Nations Conference on Trade and Development", "World Development Indicators"], "topic": ["Regional Integration", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "We analyzed the relationship between air pollution and public health by combining satellite imagery data with data on hospital admissions from the Brazilian national healthcare system.", "dataset": ["satellite imagery data", "hospital admissions from the Brazilian national healthcare system"], "topic": ["Environment", "Health"]}]

content: [{"sentence": "This study analyzes the impact of public-private partnerships in the transport sector in Brazil using data from the National Confederation of Transport.", "dataset": ["National Confederation of Transport"], "topic": ["Public-Private Partnerships", "Transport"]}, {"sentence": "The goal of this research is to explore the relationship between economic growth and renewable energy consumption.
